concept.title: Step 1: Create a Maven-based Java project

conbody.p: Let's create your Java Maven-based project with project structure looks like this:
conbody.codeblock: ├─── src/ │ └─── main/ │ ├─── java/ │ └─── resources/ │ └─── plugin.xml └─── pom.xml
